title: 98/118/EC: Council Decision of 16 December 1997 concerning the conclusion of the Protocol of Accession of the Principality of Monaco to the Convention on the Protection of the Alps
header:
7.2.1998 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 33/21
COUNCIL DECISION
of 16 December 1997
concerning the conclusion of the Protocol of Accession of the Principality of Monaco to the Convention on the Protection of the Alps
(98/118/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Protocol of Accession of the Principality of Monaco to the Convention on the Protection of the Alps is hereby approved on behalf of the European Community.
The text of the Protocol is attached to this Decision.

The President of the Council is hereby authorised to designate the person(s) empowered to deposit, on behalf of the Community, the instrument of approval with the Republic of Austria in accordance with Article 11(2) of the Convention.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. LAHURE

(2)  OJ C 339, 10. 11. 1997.
(3)  OJ L 61, 12. 3. 1996, p. 31.
